Author: bitstibit
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🔵 Pearl Pay - The Better Way ✔️
Body: Pearl Pay has an office located in the business district of Metro Manila. There are Private investors, early adopters and meetups happened in the office. People behind the project has a lot to risk in this project. Very known business people across different industries. The team offered a 100% money back guarantee option for Private Sale buyers which ended last month. Also team has 3yr vested which is audited and with legal escrow behind. The team have already employed developers for the project.  For now, The presale funding is allocated for the licenses and development of the product.  Some reasons why Komodo,  First, building in Komodo Platform is cost efficient for the team. Komodo Platform devs work hand in hand with the team. Since Pearl Pay's target market is the rural area, costing is very critical.  Second, team researched and studied all other platforms and Komodo Platform was the top choice because of its roadmap and technology. This was also identified by the China government when it first release its report about blockchain innovation. They named Komodo Platform as 2nd in innovation, next to Bitcoin. Read here: https://news.pearlpay.io/chinas-top-ranked-blockchain-platforms-and-bitcoin/  Third, mass adoption, scalability, security and transaction speed. In order for Pearl Pay to be on top of the Philippine market where internet speed is slow, they need a platform that can outperform the usual. Komodo is now at 40,000 txn/sec.  Fourth, Komodo Platform as we all know is a 3rd generation blockchain. Pioneered the Decentralized Exchange and Decentralized ICO. Also the best in Atomic Swap. Pearl Pay will have its own Decentralized Exchange.  This is actually a long list of reasons why Komodo Platform is the best blockchain for Pearl Pay.

Author: bitstibit
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🔵 Pearl Pay - The Better Way ✔️
Body: Pearl Pay created 4 different products and called it Virtual Money Logistic System or VMLS  1. Pearl Pay Mobile wallet is a white-label product that can enable Rural/Provincial or non-commercial Banks to launch their own virtual prepaid wallet. This will enable them to serve their clients at a higher level. This will also allow their clients to transact online and use e-money to buy goods and services. Users can use this to transfer money, pay bills and other typical online banking services.  2. Pearl Pay Remit is an advocacy of Pearl Pay. It is a service that will allow Oversees Filipino Workers or OFW to send their money to their love ones at the most minimal cost. The major challenge right now is the high cost of remittance in the Philippines which also happens to be the 3rd biggest remittance industry country in the world. With this initiative, Pearl Pay can lower the cost of remittance using blockchain technology.  3. Pearl Pay Exchange is a Decentralized Exchange that will provide liquidity of PRLPAY Coins. This is a vital product of Pearl Pay. This will allow users to use their cryptocurrency to purchase from non-crypto merchants.  4. PRLPAY Coins is the medium of exchange for remittance and other payments. This will also allow the company to launch its own Decentralized ICO using Komodo Platform.

Author: bitstibit
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🔵 Pearl Pay - The Better Way ✔️
Body: This is a good question.  Philippine banking system is very interesting for foreign investors. We have different kinds of banks such as, Rural bank, Co-op Bank, Thrift bank, Universal Bank and Commercial Bank.  Pearl Pay's target market for the white labeling are the Rural Banks. We have full research of the industry and have already presented use cases and business cases to the biggest Rural bank organization which consist of at least 480 bank members (494 is the total number of Rural Banks). The challenge of building their own blockchain is the cost to build one. They don't even need to build a blockchain since its more complicated and wont generate any additional revenue. Most of the Rural banks small and can only accommodate offline deposits, withdrawals, bills payment and loans. The cost to build the infrastructure is around $4m not including the labor and maintenance cost.  the real question is, what is the advantage of Pearl Pay for them?  Pearl Pay created a white-label service for the Rural banks. Its a Mobile Wallet OS that has blockchain technology in it. It will utilize PRLPAY coins as its medium of exchange for remittance and other payments. Pearl Pay has four core products combined into a single integrated system we called VMLS (Virtual Money Logistics System) which provides a comprehensive “Mobile Payment and Money Transfer Platform as a Service” appropriately designed, of world-class quality, relevant for actual use and beneficial to the financial inclusion target market.  The Pearl Pay team intend to give these services to Rural Banks for Free. This will also allow rural banks within the Pearl Pay network to transfer money from domestic to international.

Title: [ANN][ICO] 🔵 Pearl Pay - The Better Way ✔️

Author: burner2014
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🔵 Pearl Pay - The Better Way ✔️
Body: WEBSITE | NEWS AND PR | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | FACEBOOK | INSTAGRAM  |  YOUTUBE | ONEPAGER      Pearl Pay is a Virtual Money Logistics System™ (VMLS™) which provides a comprehensive “Mobile Payment and Money Transfer Platform as a Service” appropriately designed, of world-class quality, relevant for actual use and beneficial to the financial inclusion target market.         Pearl Pay Mobile Wallet is a white-label product that allows rural banks to launch their own virtual prepaid Pearl Pay and MasterCard accounts as fast as 30 days.       Pearl Pay Remit is a mobile wallet app designed for the millions of Overseas Filipino Workers (OFW) that will allow them to send money to the Philippines in just minutes and at a fraction of a cost of a traditional bank wire transfer.     Pearl Pay PESO  is an innovative product designed to transform micro, small and medium enterprises with existing stores like the sari-sari store (neighborhood sundry store), pawnshop, barber shop, pharmacy, gasoline station and other similar types of businesses to become a money remittance agent.      Pearl Pay Exchange aims to provide a trustworthy, excellent and secured ICO (Initial Coin Offering) platform. Protect the best interest of crowdfunding supporters and be preferred venue for crowdfunding.  Pearl Pay Exchange vision is to become a leading exchange for trading cryptocurrencies, utility crypto-tokens, liquidity, and crowdfunding that fuels value innovation for a better world.         Pearl Pay Coin is the energy that will propel the services of Pearl Pay Exchange provides. More than just the exclusive cryptocurrency for Pearl Pay Remit accountholders, PRLPAY coin will be utilized as an accepted cryptocurrency for companies that will launch an ICO through the Pearl Pay Exchange platform. Furthermore, PRLPAY coin will be the preferred cryptocurrency to employ Pearl Pay Exchange Notarization Nodes Service.      More than just a virtual prepaid mobile wallet, Pearl Pay is a platform into which an extensive range of third-party services will be integrated.          Name: Pearl Pay Ticker: PRLPAY Particulars: Komodo Asset Chain Supply: 500,000,000 PRLPAY Coins Bounty Campaign Allocation: 1% or 5,000,000 PRLPAY Coins Private Sale: 1 BTC = 40,000 PRLPAY 1 KMD = 13.00 PRLPAY Pre-Sale and Crowd Sale: TBA Accepted Currency: Bitcoin (BTC) and Komodo (KMD)                                                                                                                                                  WEBSITE | PEARL PAY TELEGRAM

Body: PearlPay Your Virtual Money Logistics System Pearl Pay is a Virtual Money Logistics System that provides world-class and yet affordable mobile wallet white-label service for rural banks. Using the latest technology, Pearl Pay will allow rural banks to launch their own virtual prepaid mobile wallet as fast as 30 days. "With a MatchMove partnership in place, it allows Pearl Pay to cut down the product development timeline from twenty-four (24) months to just six (6) months. The MatchMove partnership also serves as a backdoor entry to the MasterCard and Visa allowing more liquidity for the Pearl Pay accountholders. We think global and act locally. Pearl Pay has four core products combined into a single integrated system we called VMLS (Virtual Money Logistics System).  source: https://icobench.com/ico/pearlpay

Author: socul
Title: [ANN][ICO] 🔵 Pearl Pay - The Better Way ✔️
Body: Thanks to all  great teams for making this great project.
